description: This PHP source file provides an administrative interface for editing a managed device in a parental control management system. It includes server-side logic for fetching device details, processes user input for device attributes such as name, MAC address, and allowed access times, and generates an HTML form with embedded JavaScript for client-side validation and interaction.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves configuration values or system parameters by key.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Fetches the value(s) associated with a device configuration parameter.

methods.name: days_time_conversion_get
methods.description: Converts device schedule data into a usable format, such as days and times.
